name: External Git Repository in Codespace
description: Configures Codespace to work with an external Git repository

cloneUrl.description: Clone URL without username: https://dev.azure.com/{organization}/{project}/_git/{repository}. Separate multiple URLs with comma.

folder.description: Specify the workspace path in the devcontainer for the clone

cloneSecret.description: Name of the Codespaces repository secret that contains the token or password for clone. Example: ADO_PAT

userSecret.description: Name of the Codespaces user secret that contains the token or password for Codespace user

scalar.description: Use Scalar to clone the repository

sparseCheckout.description: Sparse checkout paths when using scalar. Example: common projecta/src projectb/src

options.description: Additional options for the clone operation: --depth 1 --single-branch --no-tags

telemetrySource.description: Configure source of Git commit telemetry
